#!/bin/bash
source /etc/profile.d/env.sh

declare -A config
config[env]="production"
config[region]="us-east-1"
config[instances]=5

for key in "${!config[@]}"; do
    echo "$key = ${config[$key]}"
done

if [[ -n "${DEPLOY_KEY}" ]]; then
    aws s3 sync ./build s3://mybucket --region "${config[region]}"
fi
